WHAT_SCHEDULE: What do we do with the schedule?
ERROR_DELETE_SCHEDULE: An error occurred when deleting the schedule
CONFIRM_DELETE_SCHEDULE: Sure you want to eliminate this schedule?
SCHEDULE_OVERLAP: The end of the schedule can not be equal to or less than the start of the schedule
SCHEDULE_END_OVERLAP: The end of the schedule can not be equal to or less than the start of the schedule
DELETE_FREE_DAYS: All days marked as free or holidays of this month will be eliminated. Do you agree?
SCHEDULE_CONFIRM: Schedule created, Start: {{ start }} End: {{ end }}, do you want to save it like that?
SELECT_EDIT_SCHEDULE: Select a new time zone to edit it
END_SCHEDULE: Set the end of your schedule
DAYTYPE_DONT_WORKED: This day is a holiday or holiday, you can`t set schedules

HELPERS.description1: Haremos una breve visita por la opciones que componen la aplicación deslizate por la pantalla o pulsa Sigiente
HELPERS.description2: Pincha un dia al que quieras establecer un horario trabajado
HELPERS.description3: Selecciona el inicio de tu horario y despues el final del mismo
HELPERS.description4: Puedes seleccionar el tipo de dia ya sea Festivo ,Trabajado o vacaciones, esto teservira para ver que dias no trabajas.
